taskbody.context: This procedure shows how to set up a Docker Hub account that is authorized to pull images.

step.cmd: In a web browser, create a Docker Hub account.
step.info: You may use any account name and password. The email address for this Docker Hub account must be the same address you use for support.zenoss.com.

step.cmd: Open a support ticket at support.zenoss.com.

substep.cmd: In the Subject field, enter: Docker Account Activation.
In the Body field, enter your Docker Hub account user name.
